ayas.translation: Nay, I swear by this city -

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

ayas.translation: And thou art an indweller of this city -
And the begetter and that which he begat,
We verily have created man in an atmosphere:

ayas.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
ayas.translation: Thinketh he that none hath power over him?
And he saith: I have destroyed vast wealth:
Thinketh he that none beholdeth him?
Did We not assign unto him two eyes
And a tongue and two lips,
And guide him to the parting of the mountain ways?
But he hath not attempted the Ascent -
Ah, what will convey unto thee what the Ascent is! -
(It is) to free a slave,

ayas.arabic: أَوْ إِطْعَـٰمٌ فِى يَوْمٍ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍ
ayas.translation: And to feed in the day of hunger.
ayas.transliteration: aw iṭ`āmun fī yawmin dhī masghabah

ayas.translation: An orphan near of kin,
Or some poor wretch in misery,

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ
ayas.translation: And to be of those who believe and exhort one another to perseverance and exhort one another to pity.
ayas.transliteration: thumma kāna minal ladhīna āmanū watawāṣaw biṣ ṣabri watawāṣaw bil marḥamah

ayas.translation: Their place will be on the right hand.

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
ayas.translation: But those who disbelieve Our revelations, their place will be on the left hand.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna kafarū bi-āyātinā hum aṣ-ḥābul mash-amah

ayas.translation: Fire will be an awning over them.
